ai-kv22.1:1.3_0: I have not given up identity view, and are complete in every way.
ai-kv22.1:2.3_0: A perfected one, a fully awakened Buddha ...
ai-kv22.1:2.5_0: Don’t you lack of hope for a perfected one?
ai-kv22.1:2.7_0: And he left for a perfected one, but not on the road;
ai-kv22.1:3.1_0: should not correct them like this:
ai-kv22.1:3.4_0: he knows all as perfected ones.
ai-kv22.1:3.6_0: in that case, they give up anything.
ai-kv22.1:3.7_0: The discussion of extinguishment is finished.
